name: Wormate.io
summary: Drive your worm in massively multiplayer online game! Eat sweets, donuts and cakes to grow faster. Play Wormat.io with others all over the world.
storyline:
Become the biggest and the longest worm on the server. Do worms eat sweets? Well it doesn’t matter because in Wormate.io it does. Slither and swim around the screen with your cute and colorful worm as he eat sweets, donuts and cakes to grow bigger, longer, and faster. 
 
Collect cool power ups like magnet, score multiplayer, and much more. 
 
Play with players from all over the globe. Cut off path of other players to destroy them. 
 
Hints: the longer you are the more advantage you have over other players because you can slowly encircle them to trap them until they ultimately run into you. Don’t forget to eat up your spoils.
